data.meta_description: Book Info: Red Kite, Blue Kite ~ Author: Ji-li Jiang ~ Illustrator: Greg Ruth ~ Publisher: Hyperion Book ~ Date: 2013 ~ A book about the Cultural Revolution that depicts a boy remembering flying kites with his father before they are separated; although they cannot see each other, they still fly kites to stay close. The warm-hearted story and the historical background of the Cultural Revolution make this a great book, perfect for any kid of reader.
